subject: Invitation for Manuscript Submission in Volume 9, Issue 7, July 2019.
body:
Dear Researcher


                                 Best Wishes For Your Good Health and Happiness


International Journal of Emerging Technology &Advanced Engineering (ISSN 22502459 (Online)) isan Refereed ISO 9001:2008 Certified, Peer-Reviewed and Open Access International platform for publishing reseach articles. IJETAE has been granted an ISSN 22502459 (Online) in year 2011and ISRA Impact Factor 6.351for year 2018. After publishing 82Regular Issues
(More than 6900 Research/Review Papers in Previous 8Years)
and 28Conferences , International Journal of Emerging Technology &Advanced Engineering invites you to submit research paper forpublishing inVolume 9, Issue 7, July2019.

Disclaimer: This email is sent to you in belief that you are affiliated with Academic/Research at best of our knowledge and IJETAE will be honored to publish your manuscript. Apologies if you are not intended user. If you like to stop receiving alert mails from us then please
